actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

official_title: Expressing the Boy Scouts of America freedom of association.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Boy Scouts of America has the right, as a voluntary association, to set standards for members and leaders and should not be required against its will to accept as Scouts or Scout Leaders individuals who do not reflect the traditional and moral values of the Boy Scouts of America.

titles.title: Expressing the Boy Scouts of America freedom of association.
